name: Master of The Earth: Chapter 1
description:
Master of the Earth Reborn is large adult fantasy game loosely based on the Avatar, Harry Potter and Supernatural series.
The game is a story-driven 3d visual novel where you play as a boy with magical powers who was locked away for nine years.
Nine years ago at the age of fourteen you unlocked a strange magical ability that allowed you to do as you like. Giving a young man powers such as that is simply a recipe for disaster. Your powers led you to accidentally kill an innocent woman. The town's witches banded together to capture and trap you within a magical house far away from civilization.
After nine years of studying magic every day you finally master your magic and break free from the magical shackles.
Now it is time for you to get your revenge.
Welcome to Carta Town:
Explore various locations
Meet and romance many characters
Enjoy smooth animations
High quality renders
Simple UI and Interface
